ds_id: Apple Inc. (NASDAQ:AAPL) Shares Sold by Port Capital LLC@Defense World@2023-06-15 19:54:34.506418@Apple
data_content: Port Capital has reduced its stake in Apple by 2.1% in Q4 2016, selling 1,399 shares and leaving it with 65,978 shares in the iPhone manufacturer. Adaptive Financial Consulting increased its stake in Apple by 2.7% in Q4 2016, and now has a shareholding worth $339,000. Institutional investors and hedge funds own 57.60% of Apple's stock.
